resources.string: The Boa Esperança Serve Supermarket is located at Rua Tenente Penha, 300, in the center of Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. The establishment is open Monday to Saturday, from 7:00 AM to 7:30 PM, and on Sundays, from 7:00 AM to 12:00 PM. It offers a variety of food products and everyday household items.

Belo Pão Bakery is located at Rua Mario Ybarra de Almeida, 209-303, in Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. The establishment is open Monday to Saturday, from 5 am to 7 pm, and on Sundays, from 6 am to noon. It offers a variety of breads, cakes, and other baked goods to meet everyday needs.

Tradição Choperia is located on Rua Dom Pedro II, in the center of Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. The establishment is open from Tuesday to Sunday, from 6 PM to midnight, offering a pleasant atmosphere for those seeking to enjoy good draft beer and snacks, with options for happy hour or meeting up with friends.

Ivani's Modas is a clothing store located at Rua Sete de Setembro, 380, in the center of Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. Open Monday to Saturday, from 8:30 am to 6 pm, the store offers a variety of clothing options for different styles and occasions.

AquaFlora is located at Rua Tenente Penha, 1076, in Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. The establishment is open Monday to Friday, from 7:30 am to 6:30 pm, and on Saturdays, from 7:30 am to 4 pm. It offers a variety of products related to the world of gardening, such as plants, flowers, pots, and accessories for cultivation and interior decoration.

Vip Fitness Academia is located on Rua General Osório, in the center of Boa Esperança do Sul, SP. The gym offers extended hours, operating Monday through Friday from 5:00 AM to 11:00 PM, and Saturdays from 7:00 AM to 3:00 PM. It is a space dedicated to physical activity, with infrastructure to accommodate different modalities and training levels.
